Author: thr0wawaynametaken
Text: i've been there so often and it sucks man :(  i can assure you that amount will NOT result in long-term weight gain, only water weight. it is not going to put you much over your tdee! i'd really try to stay off the scale for a few days, i know it's easier said than done, but doing it right after a binge tends to give you a false reading that's likely to trigger you.  hang in there
